name: Prince Pavor Chronicles (Demo)
description:
This is a prequel story for my other series (TV Show) that features a young version of Sir Phobos (before he was knighted) and the romance he had with Prince Pavor, the heir to the throne.

At the moment there is only a single short story detailing their meet, but I plan on including more short stories as their relationship grows.

If you would like to submit a story of your own featuring these characters to be included in a future update, you could email me at Dragyndev@gmail.com
